title: unesco_heritage_Serra_da_Capivara_National_Park
text:
Name: Serra da Capivara National Park. short_description:

Many of the numerous rock shelters in the Serra da Capivara National Park are decorated with cave paintings, some more than 25,000 years old. They are an outstanding testimony to one of the oldest human communities of South America.

. date_inscribed: 1991. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: -42.652436. latitude: -8.718634. area_hectares: 130600. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Brazil. Region: Latin America and the Caribbean. iso_code: br. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
